name: Smash Cup
description:
Smash Cup is a genre-blending top-down shooter where players craft their own base, combining MOBA, tower defense and deck-building elements for a unique battle experience.
Get ready to experience the ultimate arena battle with our futuristic and fun game! In this innovative twist on the classic MOBA genre, you'll have the chance to showcase your creativity and strategy as you build and customize your own base, develop your character, and hone your skills against opponents from all over the world.
With user-generated content at the core of the game loop, you'll have the ability to truly make the game your own. Design your base to match your playstyle, and choose from a variety of characters and skills to create your ultimate fighter. Whether you prefer fast and agile play, or prefer to bulk up and go in for the big hits, you'll have the tools you need to make your vision a reality.
And with its futuristic and sporty twist, our game is sure to provide hours of hilarious fun. The competition is fierce, but with the right strategy and a little bit of luck, you could become the next champion. So what are you waiting for? Download our app and join the battle today!
